blocks.content: Mission: To provide a pragmatic, solid and broad educational foundation where our children will be equipped with the necessary skills to excel in their various fields of study. Vision: To raise children with sound moral and spiritual standards. Our School: We offer four(4) categories of basic education - Day Care (creche) - Pre School (Reception) - Nursery (Kindergarten) - Primary (Grades 1-5) Our Curriculum: - Sunrise Keepers Infant and Junior school offers a blend of Nigerian and international curriculum to provide for versatililty and excellence - Jolly phonics system Facilities: - We maintain a colourful and attractive environment with a spacious playground recreation and physical education - Equipped science laboratory - Standard library with Books on Countries Geopgraphy, History, Animals, Science, Sport, Religion Plants etc - Internet Ready Computer Laboratory - Educative and interactive Toys/Colourful Charts - T.V Room with DVD Players - Games / Recreational facilities - Audio / Visual Learning Aids - Indoor intelligence and Vocabulary building Games - Scrabble, Chess, Monopoly - Music Training Facilities - Keyboard, Recorders and Drum set etc - Bus Services Our Staff: - Qualified and graduate teachers who are exposed to periodic and refresher training courses - All our teaching staff have been certified by the National Centre for Educational Management and Administration, (NCEMA) Abuja and the school has been accredited as a Training Compliant by NCEMA - Our teachers teach and mind after children with the fear of God Our Educational Practice: - Every child is trained in moral instruction and discipline - We train on Social and Citizenship education to build commitment to service and national pride - Character and Etiquettes is part of our educational practice - Mastery of English Grammar/Spellings - Intellectual Stimulation - Supervised outdoor activities - Good hygeine - Two(2) adults to Ten(10) pupils in our Nursery classes Extra - curricular activities: - Language Club - Red Cross Club - Computer/IT Club - Excursion Trips/Education Tours - Music/Drama Club - Debating Club What Makes Us Different: - Our School is located in a serene environment completely free from noise pollution and motorise inteference - We provide complete and total learning by the use of diverse teaching methods - We recognize that each child has a unique learning style so we adopt an interactive learning method to balance the education needs of each child SUNRISE SCHOOL ANTHEM: - Legacies of Excellence - The Pride of Sunrise Keepers - We should be a light to the world, wherever we go - We, the Sunrise Children - The legacies of excellence, - If God be for you and I, - Who can be against us? - Legacies of excellence (3x) - We'll make Nigeria great. - We are the future leaders (3x) - Children of Sunrise Keepers
